NAME: Bogdan Bogdanovic
COMMENT: Dec 24: Bogdanovic (lower leg) has been ruled out for Monday's game against Minnesota, Brad Rowland of the Locked On Podcast Network reports.

NAME: Dominick Barlow
COMMENT: Dec 24: Barlow (illness) won't play Monday against the Timberwolves.

NAME: Cody Zeller
COMMENT: Dec 22: Zeller (personal) is out for Monday's game against the Timberwolves.

NAME: Onyeka Okongwu
COMMENT: Dec 18: Okongwu is dealing with left knee inflammation and will miss at least four games, NBA writer Marc Stein reports. The big man will be re-evaluated in approximately one week.

NAME: Kobe Bufkin
COMMENT: Dec 18: Bufkin will miss the remainder of the 2024-25 season as he undergoes surgery to address his right shoulder instability, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.
